text:
"Screaming Bloody Murder" is the fifth studio album by Canadian punk rock band, Sum 41. "Screaming Bloody Murder" was released on March 25, 2011.
The album featured the self-titled single "Screaming Bloody Murder", "Baby, You Don't Wanna Know" and "Blood in My Eyes". "Blood in My Eyes" was nominated for a Metal Performance at the 2011 Grammy Awards.
Songs.
All songs written and composed by Deryck Whibley, except where noted.
